statements: SELECT * FROM news_data;
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM news_data WHERE news_id = 1;
SELECT news_title, publish_date FROM news_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM news_data ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT news_title, sentiment_score FROM news_data WHERE news_title LIKE '%breaking%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM news_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM news_data WHERE news_title ILIKE '%coronavirus%' AND publish_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 month';
SELECT news_id, news_title, sentiment_score FROM news_data WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01' AND publish_date <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT news_id, news_title, publish_date, sentiment_score FROM news_data WHERE sentiment_score < 0 OR publish_date <= '2022-05-15' ORDER BY publish_date, sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM news_data WHERE publish_date BETWEEN '2022-04-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND sentiment_score IS NOT NULL ORDER BY news_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM news_articles;
SELECT headline, published_date FROM news_articles WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT body FROM news_articles WHERE published_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT article_id, headline FROM news_articles ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, buy_threshold, active FROM trading_strategies WHERE sell_threshold < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM news_articles WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT headline, published_date FROM news_articles WHERE published_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE buy_threshold < 0.5 AND active = TRUE;
SELECT strategy_name, buy_threshold, sell_threshold FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT headline, sentiment_score FROM news_articles WHERE body LIKE '%important%' AND sentiment_score < 0.3 ORDER BY headline ASC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialMarketNews;
SELECT news_title, publish_date FROM FinancialMarketNews ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM FinancialMarketNews WHERE publish_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT news_title, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM FinancialMarketNews JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON FinancialMarketNews.news_id = SentimentAnalysis.news_id;
SELECT algorithm_name, algorithm_description FROM TradingAlgorithms WHERE algorithm_type = 'Trend Following';
SELECT news_title, publish_date FROM FinancialMarketNews
SELECT news_title, publish_date FROM FinancialMarketNews WHERE publish_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT news_title, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM FinancialMarketNews JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON FinancialMarketNews.news_id = SentimentAnalysis.news_id

SELECT news_title, algorithm_name, algorithm_type FROM FinancialMarketNews JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON FinancialMarketNews.news_id = SentimentAnalysis.news_id JOIN TradingAlgorithms ON SentimentAnalysis.sentiment_category = TradingAlgorithms.algorithm_type

SELECT news_title, sentiment_score, algorithm_name FROM FinancialMarketNews JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON FinancialMarketNews.news_id = SentimentAnalysis.news_id JOIN TradingAlgorithms ON SentimentAnalysis.sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT news_title, publication_date FROM financial_news_data;
SELECT news_title, publication_date, sentiment_score FROM financial_news_data ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT news_title, publication_date, sentiment_score FROM financial_news_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT news_title, publication_date, sentiment_score FROM financial_news_data WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01' AND sentiment_score < 0;
SELECT sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM news_sentiment_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date;
SELECT news_title, publication_date FROM financial_news_data;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE current_price > 100 ORDER BY current_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM trading_algorithms WHERE strategy = 'Trend Following';
SELECT news_title, sentiment_score FROM news_sentiment_analysis JOIN financial_news_data ON news_sentiment_analysis.news_id = financial_news_data.news_id;

SELECT news_title, publication_date, sentiment_score FROM financial_news_data INNER JOIN news_sentiment_analysis ON financial_news_data.news_id = news_sentiment_analysis.news_id ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_news;
SELECT news_title, news_timestamp FROM financial_news ORDER BY news_timestamp DESC;
SELECT news_id, news_title, news_content FROM financial_news WHERE news_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT algorithm_name, algorithm_description FROM trading_algorithms WHERE algorithm_id = 1;
SELECT stock_symbol, market_price FROM market_data WHERE news_published_date = '2022-05-12';
SELECT * FROM financial_news WHERE news_id = 1;
SELECT news_title, news_timestamp FROM financial_news WHERE news_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY news_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 AND sentiment_category = 'Positive';
SELECT algorithm_name, algorithm_description FROM trading_algorithms WHERE algorithm_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT news_id, stock_symbol, market_price FROM market_data WHERE news_published_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
